author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to solve issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31381 by following the recipe at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31381#issuecomment-689079333

#### PR validation:

Compiles and runs `runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.0 --ibeos`.

```
cmsDriver.py pedeStep --data --conditions auto:run2_data --era Run2_2018 --scenario pp -s ALCAHARVEST:SiPixelAli --filein /store/group/alca_trackeralign/debug/PromptCalibProdSiPixelAli.root
```
results in:

![Run317320](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/92634891-3fc43300-f2d5-11ea-9867-18f166a4b28a.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport and no backport is needed.
title: Attempt to solve issue with ALCAHARVEST:SiPixelAli
